title: Upday
content:
We've moved — upday tech blog - now at medium

        By Peter Krauß —

We've moved

  
  
    1 minute read
  



We’ve moved to medium!!!!
Basically the headline says it - we decided to move our blog over to medium.com.
Follow us there!!!


Tweet






Written by Peter Krauß
Peter joined upday at the very beginning. He is mobile dev lead - what basically means, that he is taking care about all the stuff most devs don't wanna think about.
